responses: Hello! Welcome to NIST19. How can I assist you today?
Hi there! I'm here to help you with any questions about NIST19.
Greetings! What would you like to know about our standards and services?

NIST19 is the National Institute of Standards and Technology. We're a non-regulatory federal agency that develops and promotes measurement, standards, and technology to enhance productivity, facilitate trade, and improve quality of life. Learn more about our mission

We are a physical sciences laboratory and a non-regulatory agency of the U.S. Department of Commerce. Our mission is to promote innovation and industrial competitiveness by advancing measurement science, standards, and technology.

Kathmandu Office: +977-1-4595450 / 4580072 / 4590727. Biratnagar: +977-21-590657 / 590216.
Call KTM Branch
Click to send Mail: Click to send Mail: communications@nist19.com
I'm here to help! You can ask me about general information about our organization.
Need assistance? I can help you find information about our services, standards, research programs, or connect you with the right resources.
What would you like to know?
NIST provides measurement services, standard reference materials, calibration services, and technical expertise to support U.S. industry and government.
Our key services include developing standards, conducting research, providing calibration services, and offering technical guidance to industry and government.
We offer laboratory services, standard reference materials, measurement traceability, and collaborative research opportunities. Learn more about our services

You can visit our offices in Kathmandu or Biratnagar depending on your location .

Kathmandu Branch Location

Biratnagar Branch Location
We are open from Sunday to Friday, 10:00 AM to 5:00 PM in Kathmandu.
Our offices remain closed on Saturdays and public holidays.
Equity trading commission ranges from 0.24% to 0.36% based on transaction amount.
Government bond trading fees vary between Rs. 10 to 0.02%, with additional SEBON and DP charges.
Corporate bond commission ranges from 0.10% to 0.15%, plus SEBON fee and DP charge.
NIST19 was licensed by SEBON on November 6, 1995 and began operation on January 22, 1997.
We are registered under license number 19 by the Securities Board of Nepal (SEBON).
We are one of six firms authorized for government bond trading in Nepal.
You can deposit funds to our account at Global IME Bank, Kamaladi branch, Account No: 07501010000740.
We accept payments via eSewa, Khalti, and Connect IPS for your convenience.
Multiple digital payment platforms are supported for easy fund transfers.
Access our trading platform at https://tms19.nepsetms.com.np for online services.
For secure trading, use your registered TMS credentials and verify OTP during login.
Ensure your Meroshare account is linked to your broker for smooth transactions.
You can download KYC, agreement, and TMS request forms from our Downloads section.
Account opening forms for individuals and institutions are available on our website.
All required documents can be accessed and submitted through the Downloads page.
